title: Oh come on reav3! I love it but I feel as if Something could have been done about the early game!
body:
First off, Those skin colourings on the model of tango eve NEED to be fixed that blue is all gross -_- better to keep it like the splash art or change the colour of that black top, it does NOT match those shades of blue, Second that Headpiece on Shadow evelynn -_- EVERY mmo that comes out that has a helmet the players complain until they have a option in the options to hide helmets -_- please learn from Mmos.  even in real life we request people to take off their hats when they enter a building because nobody wants to look at them.

Lastly! what on earth am I going to do between 1-6 in my jungle vrs invades now ?  I mean you've pretty much set me up as a Sitting duck against EVERY high mobile champion  {{champion:11}}  {{champion:92}}  {{champion:120}}  {{champion:164}}  {{champion:131}}  {{champion:60}}  {{champion:76}}  {{champion:38}}  {{champion:77}}  {{champion:59}}  {{champion:203}}  {{champion:107}}  {{champion:19}}  {{champion:104}}  {{champion:141}}  {{champion:421}}  {{champion:57}}  {{champion:36}}  {{champion:24}}  {{champion:56}}  {{champion:35}} {{champion:254}}  {{champion:62}} {{champion:5}} are going to COMPLETELY kick my ass on invades! I have no sustain in my jg, I'm always going to be week against it in these current builds, I have NO run speed escape to compensate my inability to take out their high sustain Dps alone I can no longer remove slows so after they Jump on me/slow at level 3 I have no way to get out!
I level 1 invade all the time as eve trust me without W I ain't getting out alive alone! that run speed is super important!  I have legit nothing to counter invade with in my kit!

Didn't even care to read the rest of the thread; http://i0.kym-cdn.com/photos/images/original/000/990/554/db7.gif
I did the exact same thing; dunno why people keep complaining about tango eve, her model looks way better than the splash art.

There is sustain in your kit on your passive. It works pre-6. :P

To answer your latter question, I've found the most success on Evelynn taking W level 2 to reduce damage taken from camps (e.g. Blue into Gromp). My path has been Blue > Gromp > Wolves > Raptors > Red > Scuttle. (Base/gank). 

I've found that I'm generally above 70% during and after the clear. It takes a bit of practice initially, though, mainly around utilizing the W to clear.

> [{quoted}](name=Riot Novalas,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=73tTKF0h,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2017-09-27T09:01:43.133+0000)
>
> There is sustain in your kit on your passive. It works pre-6. :P

As if that really helps. It only kicks in at absurd low HP early game and it doesn't heal much at all. Plus you have to start blue because you run out of mana crazy quick making your pathing insanely predictable.
Ive seen people start red and it worked. You can also q raptors with {{item:1039}} for hp.

> 
> I've found that I'm generally above 70% during and after the clear. It takes a bit of practice initially, though, mainly around utilizing the W to clear.

Here's a question. I'm not really understanding her ult... Why does she blink way the hell back? Like if they live with 1 health, you're screwed if you tried last hitting them with ult.
Have you seen the damage on her ultimate if they are below the health threshold? It's comparable to Veigar's ultimate if not a little more. You screw that up, I think you might deserve it.

The ult deals bonus damage to low health targets, but it helps her secure a dangerous flash kill into the enemy base, over a wall in the jungle, helps her turret dive.

I think it's going to take some getting used to but feel pretty good.

ALSO: there is an indicator when she will deal the bonus damage, but the indicator DOES NOT guarantee a kill.
Pretty sure it has damage built in to help you get the kill if they are within range. It may take a game or two to get used to but it doesn't seem that bad.

then my Complalints are void, it's just a terrifying thought, I'll never forget how badly Riven stomped me farming all my camps as evelynn.  there was nothing I could do, and it's so often that people just roll into my camps and the only thing that saves me is my stealth/W run speed.   I'm just terrified of getting caught with my pants down with no kit to help me.  and the Visual for when they can see me is SOOOooo Big!

just what am I going to do to stop these champions from farming my jungle and keeping up in the game ?

can you please just make it to hatespike heals me when targetting Jg monsters -_-  almost every Jg has the ability to stay healthy in their jg so they can at least respond to a Invade why can't eve ?  she used to be a super healing champion vrs players, why can't she be a super healing champion vrs camps.

hell even if all it did was blind Monsters that would help!
